article_title: If The Plain Meaning Of The ACA Was Good Enough For Congress, Then It's Good Enough For The Fourth Circuit

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: It is the courts' role to stop the executive when it asserts powers it does not possess, like the power to tax the King plaintiffs.
